title: Got 2 free champs
body: Hello riot, when i logged in today(01/27/2017) I had 3 notifications that says riot sent a gift(was 2 champions and an icon). I was just wondering if this was by mistake and if not what was the reason for receiving these?

replies.body: We posted a[ support banner ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-)on this issue, but what you're seeing is a backlog of old stuff you already got.  We enabled toast notifications for testing, so it's showing up there now.  Sorry for the confusion!
